block.p: BURNETT-Mary (nee Connolly) on June 7, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Herbert. Loving mother of Timothy, Kieran, Joseph, Maura and the late Christopher. Dear sister of Anne, Joan, and the late Joseph and Kevin. Cherished Grandmother of Daniel, Alina, and Emma. Friends may call at the Thomas F. Dalton Funeral Home, 125 Hillside Ave, New Hyde Park, NY, Sat 7-9:30pm, Sun 2-5 & 79:30pm. Funeral Mass Monday 11AM at Notre Dame RC Church in New Hyde Park. Interment Calvary Cemetery.
